content: Hello, there seems to be some issue with adding encounter classes, whenever I would chose the encounter class, from the expanded ActEncounterCode value-set, it doesn't add it to the resource.
Yes - I see what you mean, It's a Coding datatype (no that common) which may be the issue. I'll investigate...

Ok - should be fixed now. btw - this was caused as the HAPI server couldn't do a filter on the valueset (I suspect a bug in HAPI which I'll tell them about). However, - try using ontoserver as the terminology server - this correctly expands it .
np - let me know how you get on...
